formElement.label: WLST Absolute Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path to WLST. i.e: '/path/to/wlst.cmd' or 'wlst.sh'.

formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration. To view or create a new configuration, go to the Administration -> Plugins tab, and select 'Configure' action for @PLUGIN_KEY@ plugin.
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration.
A Configuration defines connection details and can be created by going to plugin configuration page.

formElement.label: Application Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the application which is to be updated.

formElement.label: Plan Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path to the new deployment plan file.

formElement.label: Deployment Plan Content:
formElement.documentation: Content of the deployment plan. Required, if the file named plan_path does not exist or empty.

formElement.label: Overwrite deployment plan?:
formElement.documentation: If checked, deployment plan will be overwritten, if deployment plan content has been provided and deployment plan file already exists. This option defaults to false.
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
If checked, deployment plan will be overwritten, if deployment plan content has been provided and deployment plan file already exists.
This option defaults to false.

formElement.label: Additional Options:
formElement.documentation: Comma-separated list of deployment options, specified as name-value pairs. For example: block=false,createPlan=true
